name: Microsoft Access Database Link File
summary: Learn about .ACCDW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: After an ACCDW file is opened, the target ACCDB file is automatically downloaded to a local copy on the user's computer.

instructions:
To open ACCDW file, Microsoft Access (2010 or newer) must be installed on your computer. Simply double-click the ACCDW file. If Access is installed and configured, it will use the link within the file to connect to the remote database. Since ACCDW files connect to web-hosted databases, ensure you have a stable internet connection.

Open Microsoft Access. Go to File > Open, and select the ACCDW file. Access will establish the connection to the linked database.
